    Function reference

    All functions

    abcd_anxiety
    Mock ABCD anxiety data
    abcd_cort_sa
    Mock ABCD cortical surface area data
    abcd_cort_t
    Mock ABCD cortical thickness data
    abcd_depress
    Mock ABCD depression data
    abcd_income
    Mock ABCD income data
    abcd_pubertal
    Mock ABCD pubertal status data
    abcd_subc_v
    Mock ABCD subcortical volumes data
    add_char_vec_as_cols()
    Add character vector as columns
    add_design_matrix_rows()
    Add design matrix rows
    ak_heatmap()
    Heatmap alpha and k hyperparameter results by minimum and mean p-values
    ak_scan_plot()
    Scatter plot alpha and k hyperparameter results by minimum and mean p-values
    ari_heatmap()
    Heatmap meta-clustering results
    arrange_dl()
    Given a data_list object, sort data elements by subjectkey
    assigned_clust_hist()
    Histogram of cluster membership across an output matrix
    assigned_clust_pheatmap()
    Pheatmap of cluster membership across an output matrix
    assigned_clust_scatter()
    Scatter plot of cluster membership across an output matrix
    calc_ari()
    Calculate adjusted rand index between two rows of output matrix
    calc_nmi()
    Calculate NMI scores for SNF inputs
    calc_om_aris()
    Meta-cluster calculations
    cbcl_anova()
    Calculate anova p-values for a characterization_df
    cbcl_bar_chart()
    Bar chart CBCL values for a characterization dataframe
    cbcl_ord_reg()
    Calculate overall p-values for a characterization_df
    cbcl_ord_reg_from_om()
    Calculate overall p-values for an om
    char_to_fac()
    Convert char columns to factors
    check_subj_orders_for_lp()
    Check subject orders for label propagation
    clean_plot()
    Clean a plot
    col_to_num_all_possible()
    Convert all possible columns to numeric
    convert_uids()
    Convert unique identifiers of data_list to 'subjectkey'
    discretisation()
    Adaptation of SNFtool's discretisation function
    discretisationeigenvectordata()
    Adaptation of SNFtool's discretisationeigenvectordata
    dm_heatmap()
    Heatmap design matrix based on meta-clustering results
    domain_merge()
    Domain merge
    domains()
    Domains
    execute_design_matrix()
    Execute variations of SNF as described by a design matrix - but softcoded
    execute_design_matrix_hard()
    Execute variations of SNF as described by a design matrix
    execute_inclusion()
    Execute inclusion
    extend_om()
    Extend an output matrix to include outcome evaluations
    generate_data_list()
    Generate data_list object - but softcoded
    generate_design_matrix()
    Build a design matrix - but softcoded
    generate_design_matrix_ak()
    Build design matrix for scanning alpha and K
    generate_outcome_list()
    Generate outcome_list object - but softcoded
    generate_output_matrix()
    Build output matrix
    get_cluster_df()
    Extract dataframe of cluster and subject key from output matrix row
    get_clustered_subs()
    Get clustered subjects
    get_clusters()
    Extract list of assigned clusters
    get_dist_matrix()
    Calculate distance matrices
    get_mean_p()
    Get mean p-value
    get_min_p()
    Get minimum p-value
    get_p()
    Get p-value
    get_pheatmap_order()
    Return the row ordering of a meta-clustering solution
    heatmap_pvals()
    Heatmap p-value matrix
    keep_split()
    Filter data to training or testing subjects only

    Label propagation
    lin_reg_p()
    Linear regression p-value
    lp_om()
    Label propagation over an output matrix
    mc_heatmap()
    Outdated ari_heatmap
    merge_df_list()
    Merge list of dataframes
    meta_cluster()
    Outdated calc_om_aris
    no_subs()
    Select all columns of a dataframe not starting with a given string prefix.
    om_scatter()
    Scatter plot alpha and k hyperparameter results by minimum and mean p-values

    Calculate NMI scores for an output matrix
    ord_reg_p()
    Ordinal regression p-value
    p_val_select()
    Select p-values from output matrix
    plot_all_cbcl()
    Plot clusters across all CBCL measures
    plot_nmis()
    Scatter plot the NMI values for each row of an nmi_df
    prefix_dl_sk()
    Remove NAs from a data_list object
    pvals_pheatmap()
    Pheatmap a matrix of p-values
    random_removal()
    Generate random removal sequence
    reduce_dl_to_common()
    Reduce data_list to common subjects
    remove_dl_na()
    Remove NAs from a data_list object

    Wrapper for ggsave
    scabcd_hist()
    Wrapper for geom_hist
    select_om()
    Select specific row_ids from an output matrix

    Adaptation of SNFtool's spectral clustering function

    Select all columns of a dataframe starting with a given string prefix.

    summarize_ol()

    Select the top output matrix rows for each cluster
